dialog.text: Three layers of the picture(top,mid,bot). Top is sky, mid is snow mountains, bot is grass
How much snow is there on the mountains?
for the mid part, one third of the top mid is snow
Are there any clouds in the sky?
yes, but just randomly and light
Is there anything on the grass and mountains other than snow? Like plants?
just snow on the top of the mountains. between the mid and bot section, there are rocks. From left to right, the rocks size increase. the grass is kind of dry, but not too much
try to clear up (change the filter), try to see the mountain and the rocks more clearly. for the clouds, you can see is a piece by piece, not a big block of it
i will say try to do more clouds (as least the clouds that you can see / identify)
I've added more patches of clouds. Done.
